bill.summary:
Countering Chinese Communist Party Malign Influence Act
This bill authorizes through FY2024 activities to counter globally the malign influence of the Chinese Communist Party (CCP), including CCP attempts to undermine the free and open international order or the sovereignty of the United States or other countries.
